snippet: FOWNES--Henry, 93, advertising executive, television and motion picture producer. After a long illness passed away peacefully on February 3, 2016. He is survived by his wife, Polly, two daughters, Lisa Fownes, Stephanie Corzatt, three grandchildren and two stepchildren. Services will be private. 1/3
lead_paragraph: FOWNES--Henry, 93, advertising executive, television and motion picture producer. After a long illness passed away peacefully on February 3, 2016. He is survived by his wife, Polly, two daughters, Lisa Fownes, Stephanie Corzatt, three grandchildren and two stepchildren. Services will be private. 1/3
